sentences.en: As we walked along the seashore we saw lots of tiny crabs.
sentences.cn: 我们在海岸上散步时看到很多小蟹.

sentences.en: He had a very pleasant vacation at the seashore.
sentences.cn: 他在海滩度过愉快的假期.

sentences.en: Much wearing and breaking of rocks takes place on the seashore.
sentences.cn: 海边也有大量的岩石腐蚀破坏的情况.

sentences.en: One day he went to the seashore before daybreak.
sentences.cn: 一天黎明前他来到海滨.

sentences.en: She sells seashells on the seashore.
She takes her inspiration from shells and stones she finds on the seashore.
sentences.cn: 她从在海滩上捡到的贝壳和石子中汲取灵感。

sentences.en: The children picked up many sea shells at the seashore.
sentences.cn: 孩子们在海边捡到许多贝壳.

sentences.en: The seashore is not far from here.
The seashore was covered with shells.
The trip to the seashore brought her out of her depression.
sentences.cn: 到海边旅行使她不再抑郁.

sentences.en: We had a delightful time by the seashore last Sunday.
sentences.cn: 上星期天我们在海滨玩得真痛快.

sentences.en: We took a walk along the seashore.

trans.tran_en: the land at the edge of the sea, consisting of sand and rocks
